thread.title: Nancy Armstrong
thread.title_full: HelloFresh US reviewed by Nancy Armstrong

author: Nancy Armstrong
title: Nancy Armstrong
text: I really like Hello Fresh. I have an extremely busy schedule, and it is so wonderful to have a good variety of meals each week and not have to plan or shop for myself. Occasionally the produce is not as fresh as it should be. There have been a few of times that I've had to complain about the produce and/or delivery issues. Hello Fresh has always responded quickly and made things "right" again. I have definitely referred friends and family to Hello Fresh. Most have really enjoyed the experience. Unfortunately, there were two families that tried it once and did not have a good experience at all because the produce was not good... : ( Since then I believe the overall quality has improved. One last comment: it would be nice if there were more lower calorie choices for us health-conscious people.
